instruction: Given a product or service, explain why consumers would prefer it over another similar product or service.
output: Netflix offers a much larger selection of high-quality original TV shows and movies than Hulu. Netflix has a larger library of popular films and TV shows, as well as a large collection of classic films and shows. Netflix also offers the ability to stream content to multiple devices, while Hulu offers only one stream at a time. Additionally, Netflix has more consistent user experience, with fewer commercials than Hulu.
